div.sent: We live in a family.
Outside the family we have neighbours, friends and relatives.
In the school we have classmates, teachers and many others.
All of them form society. Man is a social being.
From time immemorial man lives together.
Each man lives in some society or other.
The basis of society is unity, cooperation and living together.
Each society has certain rules and regulations.
We will observe them.
Our family consists of father, mother, brothers and sisters.
We grow up with their love and affection.
We will respect our elders and love our youngers.
Young or old will live peacefully together.
We will help them and co-operate them in their various work.
We will remember the motto?
we will read in due time and play in due time.
We will never misbehave or show misconduct with any member of the family.
Those who live around us are our neighbours.
They are close to us.
They come forward to help us in weal and woe.
So the role of neighbours is very important in our society.
Of the neighbours some are seniors, some are juniors, some are of the same age.
We will never offend the neighbours and we will share their joys and sorrows.
We will also invite them to our functions.
If we prepare any good food, we will send them some of it.
We will develop the mentality to live together peacefully.
We study at school and learn many useful things about society.
We also learn about hospitality and help towards people who are poor and in trouble.
In our spare time we take part in various games and sports and cultural activities.
From school we go on picnics and educational excursions to places of historical interests.
Through participation in these activities we come to learn new things.
As a result co-operation, sympathy, discipline, duty, politeness etc.
These social qualities are developed in us.
We need these social qualities to carry out our responsibilities in society.
Let us take down the following table in our notebooks and complete it.
Our duty is to go to school in time and learn our lessons inventively.
We will behave well with our classmates.
At school our teachers teach us many things with love and affection.
They always think about our welfare.
We will never misbehave with them.
We will obey their advice.
We will respect and honour them.
We will behave well with them, help them and co-operate them in their troubles.
Various classes of people live in society.
We are dependent on them and we will behave well with them.
Time is valuable in our life.
We will do our daily duties the same day.
We will never put off any work for tomorrow.
